if it's jammed you may need to pop it open manually.
Grab a paper clip, straighten it out, and place it in the small hole on the front of the drive.  Goes in a ways, but will open the drawer.
For me if the button on the front doesn't work, the CD is usually a bit off.  If it's a software problem I'm afraid I won't be much help.
